name: Standing Portals
description: Permanent magical gateways provide access to distant locations or other planes of existence. The transportation opportunities provide access to unique resources and knowledge, while the constant planar traffic attracts both legitimate travelers and dangerous interplanar threats.
atmosphere: Permanent gateways shimmer with otherworldly energy while planar traffic flows through portals with constant movement and purpose. The air carries exotic scents and visible ripples in reality and space. Every surface vibrates with transportation magic. Your skin tingles with otherworldly energy and the sense of interplanar danger.
